header.description: Here is a small text that discusses the goal of my application and presents myself quickly something. I will not discuss extensively any precise topics, simply do a presentation with a few key elements, basically an abstract of an appended cover letter for the application to the job I would like to apply to.

languages.name: English
languages.comment: Fluent technical level\\Erasmus program (2 semesters) in Prague with english courses

languages.name: German
languages.comment: Lived 2 month as part of the Brigitte Sauzay exchange program

curriculum.name: PhD thesis
comment: University doctoral Scholarship at Laboratoire d'Acoustique de l'Université du Mans
Research on metaporoelastic surfaces and interfaces for the joint mitigation of acoustic and elastic energies
Numerical methods for the computation of dispersion relations
Teaching experience: Master course on TMM and bachelor-level acoustics practicals sessions

curriculum.name: MSc Degree in Wave Physics and Acoustics
comment: International Master's degree in Wave physics and Acoustics
2 year-long project on acoustic absorption by metaporoelastic materials
Education on academic research and various topics on wave propagation and phenomena

curriculum.name: L3 Erasmus
comment: Last year of Bachelor at CTU, Prague
Projects on wireless communication and radio antennas and acoustic event detection with a microphone array

curriculum.name: Licence SPI CMI
comment: Licence de sciences pour l'ingénieur (engineering sciences), acoustics and vibrations
Internship: Acoustic study of a ball impact on a water surface
